title: wine_Le_Cadeau_2012_Rocheux_Reserve_Pinot_Noir_(Chehalem_Mountains)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 86441.
country: US.
description: Production is down, quality, cost and finished alcohol are all up for this estate-grown designate, now labeled as a reserve. There's a sniff of leather and underripe blackberry and black cherry fruit, along with a somewhat unusual, though not unpleasant, scent of chicken boullion. The wine opens up quickly but stops just a bit short of a full-length finish. Give it extra breathing time if you plan to drink it soon..
designation: Rocheux Reserve.
points: 91.
price: 80.0.
province: Oregon.
region_1: Chehalem Mountains.
region_2: Willamette Valley.
taster_name: Paul Gregutt.
